amendment.description: To provide for the conduct of a study on the relationship between intimate partner violence and traumatic brain injury.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3825 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3825 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cortez Masto to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5902; text: CR S5902) To provide for the conduct of a study on the relationship between intimate partner violence and traumatic brain injury.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3825 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cortez Masto to Amendment SA 3695.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3825 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
